# Pull Request

## Release Type
Please select the type of change:
- [ ] **Major Update** - Breaking changes, new architecture, major features, version increment
- [ ] **Minor Update** - Bug fixes, small improvements, small refactors

---

## Description
Provide a brief summary of your changes.

---

## For Major Updates

### What's New?
Describe the new features, improvements, or structural changes introduced in this update.

### Breaking Changes
List any backward-incompatible changes or required migrations.

### Impact Assessment
Describe potential impacts on:
- Performance
- Compatibility
- User experience
- Existing modules

---

## For Minor Updates

### Type of Change
- [ ] Small bug fix
- [ ] Minor feature improvement
- [ ] Small refactor
- [ ] Documentation tweak

---

## Testing
Explain how your changes were tested:
- What tests were added or updated?
- Coverage impact?
- Manual testing steps?

---

## Checklist
- [ ] All relevant tests have been added or updated
- [ ] Code follows the project's style guidelines and architecture
- [ ] Documentation has been updated (README, wiki, code comments, etc.)
- [ ] No unused or experimental code left behind
- [ ] Breaking changes are clearly documented (if applicable)
- [ ] Dependencies updated if required
- [ ] Version number bumped appropriately (if using semantic versioning)
- [ ] I have manually tested critical paths
